## Dropbox

```{r}
library(rdrop2)
library(knitr)
token <- drop_auth()
saveRDS(token, file = "token.rds")
token <- readRDS("token.rds")
a <- drop_read_csv("Reporting/FY 2021/6 - week of August 10/Snapchat_8.10.20_to8.16.20.csv")
kable(a)

```
